    • Constructor Detail

      • MyController

        public MyController()

    • Method Detail

      • handleButtonAction

        public void handleButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        handleButtonAction Will be executed, when the "connect" button in the "connect to database" is pressed. It tries to connect to a database by using the given parameters. In case they're working, the main select statement will be executed and displayed in the TableView in the next tab.
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent generated by the click event

      • updateClicked

        public void updateClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        updateClicked will be executed, if the "update" button for the row update is pressed. It takes the given parameters and puts them into a SQL statement, which is protected by a transaction.
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent generated by the click event
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - could throw a SQLException, caused by the rollback() method

      • updateTableClicked

        public void updateTableClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        updateTableClicked will be executed, when the upper "update" button for the tableView is pressed. Clears the whole tableView to add the latest data.
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent generated by the click event

      • disconnectPressed

        public void disconnectPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        disconnectPressed disconnect button pressed; tabs will be deactivated and the textfields reset for clean reuse. simple explained: the program will be "reseted"
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent generated by the click event

      • insertClicked

        public void insertClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        insertClicked checks if the given input for the insert is valid. In this case, it will be inserted into the database.
        Parameters:
        event - ActionEvent generated by the click event
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - could throw a SQLException, caused by the rollback() method

      • onMouseClicked

        public void onMouseClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        onMouseClicked will be executed, if the user clicks inside the tableView on a cell. This method reads the data, which is inside the clicked row.
        Parameters:
        event - MouseEvent generated by the mouse event

      • deleteClicked

        public void deleteClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        deleteClicked this method will be executed, when the delete button is pressed in the output tab. It will execute a delete SQL statment which deletes the selected row.
        Parameters:
        event - MouseEvent generated by the mouse event
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - could throw a SQLException, caused by the rollback() method

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        initialize necessary method of Initializable
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
